document_data.name: Abul Fiydah
document_data.mainbody: '''Abul Fiydah''' was the Amir of [[Estanil]] during the midâ€“14th century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities:
As the ultimate commander of the forces stationed in Estanil, Abul was faced with the difficult task of defending the border city of [[Semphar]].

Five thousand troops were at his disposal, though only 1,000 were in the city at any given time. They were stationed in the only stone building within the city.

Strangely enough, his most difficult challenges did not come from the [[goblin]]s and [[elf|elves]] who attacked from outside of the city, but from the [[Council of Loggers]] found within.
